hero.title: Your smile, our priority
hero.subtitle: Modern dental clinic in Satu Mare, with a team of specialists dedicated to your dental health.

services.title: Our services
services.subtitle: We offer a complete range of dental services, from prevention to complex treatments.

descriptions.generalDentistry: Consultations, professional cleanings, fillings and preventive treatments for dental health.
descriptions.cosmeticDentistry: Dental veneers, professional whitening and aesthetic treatments for a perfect smile.
descriptions.implantology: State-of-the-art dental implants for replacing missing teeth.
descriptions.orthodontics: Classic and invisible braces for perfect teeth alignment.
descriptions.pediatric: Gentle and friendly treatments for children's dental health.
descriptions.emergencies: Fast assistance for dental emergencies, also available on weekends.

fallback.consultationDesc: Complete evaluation of dental health with a personalized treatment plan.
fallback.consultationBenefit1Desc: Modern equipment for a detailed assessment of your dental health.
fallback.consultationBenefit2Desc: Receive a treatment plan tailored to your specific needs.
fallback.consultationBenefit3Desc: The first consultation is free, with no obligation.
fallback.consultationStep1Desc: Contact us to schedule a consultation at a convenient time.
fallback.consultationStep2Desc: The doctor will perform a complete examination of the oral cavity.
fallback.consultationStep3Desc: You will receive a detailed plan with recommended treatment options.
fallback.implantsDesc: The permanent solution for replacing missing teeth with state-of-the-art implants.
fallback.implantsBenefit1Desc: Implants last a lifetime with proper care.
fallback.implantsBenefit2Desc: Impossible to distinguish from natural teeth.
fallback.implantsBenefit3Desc: Chew and smile as if you had your natural teeth.
fallback.implantsStep1Desc: Oral cavity evaluation and 3D implant planning.
fallback.implantsStep2Desc: Procedure to place the titanium implant in the bone.
fallback.implantsStep4Desc: Fitting the final crown on the implant.
fallback.crownsDesc: Durable restorations for protecting and aesthetically improving damaged teeth.
fallback.crownsBenefit1Desc: Protects the damaged tooth from further deterioration.
fallback.crownsBenefit2Desc: Restores the natural appearance of the tooth.
fallback.crownsStep1Desc: Shaping the tooth to receive the crown.
fallback.crownsStep2Desc: Creating the impression for crown fabrication.
fallback.crownsStep3Desc: Permanent fixation of the crown on the tooth.
fallback.veneersDesc: Aesthetic transformation of your smile with custom ceramic veneers.
fallback.veneersBenefit1Desc: The perfect smile in just 2 visits to the office.
fallback.veneersBenefit2Desc: White, straight, and uniformly sized teeth.
fallback.veneersBenefit3Desc: Preserves the natural structure of the tooth.
fallback.veneersStep1Desc: Smile analysis and simulation of the final result.
fallback.whiteningDesc: Professional whitening treatment for a bright smile in just one hour.
fallback.whiteningBenefit1Desc: Up to 8 shades whiter in a single session.
fallback.whiteningBenefit3Desc: Results last 1-2 years with minimal maintenance.
fallback.whiteningStep2Desc: Professional whitening gel applied to teeth.
fallback.whiteningStep3Desc: Activating the gel with a special LED lamp.
fallback.scalingDesc: Professional cleaning for healthy gums and cavity prevention.
fallback.scalingBenefit1Desc: Prevents and treats gingivitis and periodontitis.
fallback.scalingBenefit2Desc: Eliminates bacteria that cause bad breath.
fallback.scalingBenefit3Desc: Reduces the risk of cavities and periodontal disease.
fallback.scalingStep1Desc: Examination of gum condition and deposits.
fallback.scalingStep3Desc: Polishing teeth and applying protective fluoride.
fallback.generalDentistryDesc: Comprehensive dental care including examinations, preventive treatments, fillings, and routine maintenance to keep your smile healthy and beautiful.
fallback.generalDentistryBenefit1Desc: Regular check-ups and cleanings help detect issues early and prevent serious dental problems.
fallback.generalDentistryBenefit2Desc: From cavities to gum disease, we address all aspects of your dental health under one roof.
fallback.generalDentistryBenefit3Desc: Every patient receives a customized care plan tailored to their unique needs and goals.
fallback.generalDentistryStep1Desc: Thorough evaluation of teeth, gums, and oral tissues using modern diagnostic tools.
fallback.generalDentistryStep2Desc: Removal of plaque and tartar buildup to maintain optimal oral hygiene.
fallback.generalDentistryStep3Desc: Development of a personalized treatment plan to address any identified issues.
fallback.generalDentistryStep4Desc: Regular monitoring and maintenance appointments to ensure lasting dental health.
fallback.cosmeticDentistryDesc: Transform your smile with our advanced aesthetic treatments including veneers, whitening, and smile makeovers designed to enhance your natural beauty.
fallback.cosmeticDentistryBenefit1Desc: Achieve the radiant, confident smile you've always dreamed of with our aesthetic treatments.
fallback.cosmeticDentistryBenefit2Desc: Our treatments are designed to enhance your natural appearance for seamless, authentic results.
fallback.cosmeticDentistryBenefit3Desc: A beautiful smile enhances self-esteem and makes a lasting impression in every interaction.
fallback.cosmeticDentistryStep1Desc: Comprehensive evaluation of your smile aesthetics and discussion of your goals.
fallback.cosmeticDentistryStep2Desc: See your potential results through digital smile simulation before treatment begins.
fallback.cosmeticDentistryStep3Desc: Precise implementation of your customized aesthetic treatment plan.
fallback.cosmeticDentistryStep4Desc: Enjoy your stunning new smile with guidance on maintaining your beautiful results.
fallback.prostheticsDesc: Restore function and aesthetics with our high-quality dental prosthetics including crowns, bridges, and dentures crafted for optimal comfort and natural appearance.
fallback.prostheticsBenefit1Desc: Regain the ability to eat, speak, and smile with confidence using durable prosthetic solutions.
fallback.prostheticsBenefit2Desc: Custom-crafted prosthetics that match your natural teeth in color, shape, and size.
fallback.prostheticsBenefit3Desc: Premium materials and expert craftsmanship ensure your prosthetics last for years.
fallback.prostheticsStep1Desc: Comprehensive evaluation of your oral health and discussion of prosthetic options.
fallback.prostheticsStep2Desc: Digital or traditional impressions for perfectly fitted prosthetics.
fallback.prostheticsStep3Desc: Expert creation of your prosthetics in a specialized dental laboratory.
fallback.prostheticsStep4Desc: Careful placement and fine-tuning to ensure optimal comfort and function.
fallback.implantologyDesc: The gold standard for tooth replacement. Our dental implants provide a permanent, natural-looking solution that preserves jawbone health and restores your complete smile.
fallback.implantologyBenefit1Desc: Dental implants are designed to last a lifetime with proper care and maintenance.
fallback.implantologyBenefit2Desc: Implants stimulate the jawbone, preventing bone loss that occurs with missing teeth.
fallback.implantologyBenefit3Desc: Eat, speak, and smile naturally without the limitations of traditional dentures.
fallback.implantologyStep1Desc: 3D imaging and comprehensive evaluation to plan your implant treatment precisely.
fallback.implantologyStep2Desc: Surgical insertion of the titanium implant into the jawbone under local anesthesia.
fallback.implantologyStep3Desc: Healing period of 3-6 months as the implant fuses with your natural bone.
fallback.implantologyStep4Desc: Attachment of a custom-made crown for a natural-looking, functional tooth.
fallback.orthodonticsDesc: Achieve perfectly aligned teeth and a harmonious bite with our orthodontic treatments, including traditional braces and clear aligners for patients of all ages.
fallback.orthodonticsBenefit1Desc: Correct misaligned teeth for a beautiful, confident smile you'll love to show.
fallback.orthodonticsBenefit2Desc: Proper alignment reduces wear, jaw pain, and improves overall oral function.
fallback.orthodonticsBenefit3Desc: Choose from traditional braces or nearly invisible aligners based on your lifestyle.
fallback.orthodonticsStep1Desc: Complete evaluation including X-rays and digital scans to plan your treatment.
fallback.orthodonticsStep2Desc: Choose the best option for your needs: metal braces, ceramic, or clear aligners.
fallback.orthodonticsStep3Desc: Regular adjustments and monitoring to gradually move teeth into ideal positions.
fallback.orthodonticsStep4Desc: Custom retainers to maintain your beautiful new smile for life.
fallback.endodonticsDesc: Save your natural teeth with our expert root canal treatments. Using advanced techniques and technology, we eliminate infection while preserving your tooth structure.
fallback.endodonticsBenefit1Desc: Preserve your natural tooth instead of extraction, maintaining your smile's integrity.
fallback.endodonticsBenefit2Desc: End the discomfort of tooth infection with effective, long-lasting treatment.
fallback.endodonticsBenefit3Desc: Advanced technology makes root canal treatment comfortable and highly successful.
fallback.endodonticsStep1Desc: Detailed examination and imaging to assess the extent of infection or damage.
fallback.endodonticsStep2Desc: Complete numbing of the area ensures a comfortable, pain-free procedure.
fallback.endodonticsStep3Desc: Removal of infected tissue and thorough cleaning of the root canal system.
fallback.endodonticsStep4Desc: Sealing the tooth and placing a crown to protect and restore full function.
fallback.oralSurgeryDesc: Expert surgical solutions for complex dental issues including wisdom teeth extraction, bone grafting, and jaw surgery performed with precision and care.
fallback.oralSurgeryBenefit1Desc: Specialized surgeons with extensive training in complex oral and facial procedures.
fallback.oralSurgeryBenefit2Desc: Minimally invasive approaches that reduce recovery time and improve outcomes.
fallback.oralSurgeryBenefit3Desc: From extractions to reconstructive surgery, we handle all surgical needs.
fallback.oralSurgeryStep1Desc: Thorough evaluation and discussion of your condition and treatment options.
fallback.oralSurgeryStep2Desc: Detailed surgical planning using advanced imaging for optimal results.
fallback.oralSurgeryStep3Desc: Expert execution of your procedure with appropriate anesthesia and monitoring.
fallback.oralSurgeryStep4Desc: Comprehensive post-operative care and follow-up to ensure proper healing.
fallback.pediatricDentistryDesc: Gentle, child-friendly dental care in a welcoming environment. We make dental visits fun while establishing healthy habits that last a lifetime.
fallback.pediatricDentistryBenefit1Desc: Our team is specially trained to make children feel comfortable and at ease.
fallback.pediatricDentistryBenefit2Desc: Early care and education help prevent dental problems before they start.
fallback.pediatricDentistryBenefit3Desc: Fun, stress-free visits that build a foundation for lifelong dental health.
fallback.pediatricDentistryStep1Desc: A welcoming tour and gentle introduction to help children feel comfortable.
fallback.pediatricDentistryStep2Desc: Careful, kid-friendly check-up with age-appropriate explanations.
fallback.pediatricDentistryStep3Desc: Cleanings, fluoride treatments, and sealants to protect developing teeth.
fallback.pediatricDentistryStep4Desc: Guidance on home care and nutrition to support your child's dental health.
fallback.dentalEmergenciesDesc: Fast, effective care when you need it most. Our emergency dental services provide prompt relief for toothaches, broken teeth, and other urgent dental issues.
fallback.dentalEmergenciesBenefit1Desc: Same-day appointments available for urgent dental problems and pain relief.
fallback.dentalEmergenciesBenefit2Desc: Quick diagnosis and treatment to eliminate pain and prevent further damage.
fallback.dentalEmergenciesBenefit3Desc: Emergency care available when other dental offices are closed.
fallback.dentalEmergenciesStep1Desc: Call our emergency line for immediate guidance and appointment scheduling.
fallback.dentalEmergenciesStep2Desc: Quick evaluation to identify the problem and determine urgent treatment needs.
fallback.dentalEmergenciesStep3Desc: Prompt intervention to relieve pain and address the emergency situation.
fallback.dentalEmergenciesStep4Desc: Comprehensive follow-up to ensure complete resolution and prevent recurrence.

general.q1: What services does Dentcraft clinic offer?
general.a1: We offer a complete range of dental services, including general dentistry, cosmetic dentistry, implantology, orthodontics, pediatric dentistry and dental emergencies.
general.a2: Yes, the first consultation is free. You will receive a complete assessment of your dental health and a personalized treatment plan.

pricing.a1: We accept cash, bank card and bank transfer. We also offer installment payment options for more complex treatments.

treatments.q1: How long does a dental implant take?
treatments.a1: The dental implant procedure usually takes between 3-6 months, depending on the complexity of the case and the healing time required.

appointments.q1: How can I book a consultation?
appointments.a1: You can book a consultation by phone at 0741 199 977, via WhatsApp or by filling out the contact form on the website.
